DeferralPlist.title: DeferralPlist
DeferralPlist.description: Location where the plist is stored so that the values CurrentDeferralValue, ForceInstallDateTime and the PlanID are stored locally on the device.

DeferralValueCustom.title: Maximum Deferral
DeferralValueCustom.description: How many days can the user postpone the update. This value is also used to specify the current date plus this value then specifies the date on which the update is forced.

scriptLog.title: scriptLog
scriptLog.description: Where should the script logs be wrote and saved

JamfProCredentials.title: Encoded Credentials für API User
JamfProCredentials.description: Mandatory field! (printf 'username:password' | iconv -t ISO-8859-1 | base64 -i -). Can either be stored here or via the Jamf Pro variable $4. It is recommended that these are transferred via the Jamf Pro variable, so they are not stored on the device.

MajorUpdateapplyVersion.title: Update macOS Minor zu Version
MajorUpdateapplyVersion.description: If nothing is specified, the latest available version is used. Not yet defined in the script.

Dialog_Settings.description: The Swift dialog window can be adjusted in height, width, heading size and font size. If no values are set via the plist, the values from the script are used.

Buttontimer.description: So that the user takes the time to read the message and does not accidentally click the buttons, they are deactivated for a certain time and only reactivated after expiry. This time can be adjusted here for the various windows. Specified in seconds. If no values are set via the profile, the default values are used aim Script.

buttontimer_Final_Message.title: Timer für Buttons Final Message
buttontimer_Final_Message.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Final User Info' are activated and the user can click on them so that the user has enough time to read the message. Specified in seconds.

buttontimer_pleaseWait_new.title: Timer für Buttons Please Wait
buttontimer_pleaseWait_new.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Please Wait Message' are activated and the user can click them so that the user has enough time to read the message and the message within it? This informs the user that they should please be patient. Specified in seconds.

buttontimer_pleaseWait_alt.title: Timer für Buttons Please Wait
buttontimer_pleaseWait_alt.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Please Wait Message' are activated and the user can click them so that the user has enough time to read the message and the message within it? This informs the user that they should please be patient. Specified in seconds.

buttontimer_ErrorMessage.title: Timer für Buttons Error Message
buttontimer_ErrorMessage.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Error Message' are activated and the user can click on them so that the user has enough time to read the message and the message within it? This informs the user that something has gone wrong. Specified in seconds.

Messanges.description: Definition of the messages for the standard message, error message, etc. Please specify the complete messages in the respective language carefully. The following variables can be used: %REAL_NAME% | %CURRENT_DEFERRAL_VALUE% | %forceInstallLocalDateTime% These are replaced in the script with the respective variables in the script

MaxMessageTime.title: Timeout Meldung
MaxMessageTime.description: How long the message is displayed to users before it is automatically closed. Specified in seconds.

SupportContact.title: Support Contact
SupportContact.description: Who can the user contact if necessary.

StandardUpdatePrompt.title: Update: Standard message
StandardUpdatePrompt.description: The message with which the user is informed about the available updates.

ForcedUpdatePrompt.title: Update: Last message
ForcedUpdatePrompt.description: The message when the user has used up their maximum number of postponements.

PleaseWaitTitle.title: Please wait: Title
PleaseWaitTitle.description: Heading of the window informing about the started update.

PleaseWaitDescription.title: Please wait: Message
PleaseWaitDescription.description: Message informing about the started update.

PowerWaitTimer.title: Power: Timeout
PowerWaitTimer.description: Timeout in seconds, the user has to connect the power supply unit.

PowerTitle.title: Power: Titel
PowerTitle.description: Title of the window that prompts you to connect the power supply unit.

PowerDescription.title: Power: Message
PowerDescription.description: Message prompting to connect the power supply unit.

NoPowerDescription.title: Power: Abort message
NoPowerDescription.description: Message informing that the power supply unit has been disconnected.

ErrorTitle.title: Error: Title
